title: Anivia q Bug
body: I've only seen it since I've gotten black frost anivia the classic skin is doesn't happen but when i play with blackfrost the q disappears half way though not being able to see where it is and when to click it again to stun them, it happens about 50% of the time and it affects her quite bad….
